commitResults.messageTitle: fix: solves issue#185, and switch ascending and descending comparators
Fix clear command message to reflect product name 'TrackUp'
Fix UG: Remove invalid compound sort example and clarify single-field support
Prevent adding contacts with numeric-only names
commitResults.messageBody: Updated the Name class to disallow names made up of only digits (e.g., 1234), as this caused confusion with phone numbers and impaired search accuracy. Added regex validation to ensure names contain at least one letter. Updated corresponding tests.
